parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular
Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To offer, give; I put, place. A prolonged form of a primary verb; to give.
Neuter of a presumed derivative of the original form of tlao; a balance, i.e. a certain weight or 'talent'.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular

str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Personal / Relative Pronoun - Dative Masculine Singular

str2: One. (including the neuter Hen); a primary numeral; one.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.
A primary particle; down, in varied relations (genitive, dative or accusative) with which it is joined).
Pertaining to self, i.e. One's own; by implication, private or separate.
From dunamai; force; specially, miraculous power.

word: he promptly went on his journey.
parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be away from home, go into another country, be away, be abroad. From apodemos; to go abroad, i.e. Visit a foreign land.
